thumb.name: Return Address 1/2 x 1 3/4
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ELabel Instructions:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr/%3E%3Cbr/%3E1. To personalize and print this project, click on the preview image to the left to open the workspace.%3Cbr/%3E%3Cbr/%3E2. Personalize the text and graphics. Select the text to change it or its size, color, and font. Even add digital photos!%3Cbr/%3E%3Cbr/%3E3. Click on the Print button, select the number of copies you'd like to print and go!. If you choose to print multiple copies, the same design will be repeated for each labels on the page.%3Cbr/%3E%3Cbr/%3E%3Cb%3ETips:%3C/b%3E Print your labels on plain paper first to check the alignment. spelling. and overall look of the project. %3Cbr/%3E%3Cbr/%3E
